original_text: Then all the Israelites left Elim and they went into the desert called Sin. This is between Elim and Sinai. They arrived in the desert on the 15th day of the second month after they had left Egypt.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중이 엘림에서 떠나 엘림과 시내 산 사이에 있는 신 광야에 이르니 애굽에서 나온 후 둘째 달 십오일이라

sentences.original_text: Then all the Israelites left Elim
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모든 이스라엘 사람들이 엘림을 떠났습니다

sentences.original_text: and they went into the desert called Sin
This is between Elim and Sinai
on the 15th day of the second month
